summary: With this mod, arrows deal extra damage depending on how far you are away from the target. By default, it is 1 damage per 10 metres, or an extra 1 per metre if sneaking and undetected. It also tells you how far away you the shot was. However, you change these values. Set OvIsniperdamage to xx is how much per metre, Set OvIsneaksniperdamage to xx pe
descriptionHtml:
With this mod, arrows deal extra damage depending on how far you are away from the target. By default, it is 1 damage per 10 metres, or an extra 1 per metre if sneaking and undetected. However, you change these values. Set OvIsniperdamage to xx is how much per metre, Set OvIsneaksniperdamage to xx per metre.

Get ready for those [color=green]420[/color] [s]quick[/s]BOWscopes.

Whenever you shoot someone, it tells you approximately how many metres the arrow went.
To start up, open the console, and type help "sniping".
Then type player.addperk whatevertheidis .

Have fun!

>Please check out my other mods!
author: Oliver1706
